feed.title: Ron Becker |
feed.subtitle: SysAdmin, CyberSec, Web Development, and more.

entry.title: Hello, world!
entry.content:
You’re probably wondering where the hell you’ve ended up.

And that’s a very, very good question. Now is your chance to run off to Google, or Reddit. Go ahead.

Oh, you actually stuck around? I’m sorry… now you are doomed to reading this garbage. Well, since you’re here I may as well explain who I am, and what I plan to do around here.

My name is Ron Becker

And, I love to learn about, talk about, and share information about a variety of fields. You may run across posts covering everything from CyberSec, SysAdmin, Linux, Web Development, and more. My interests, and hobbies are luckily pretty varied. Unlike my skill set… I have been working with computers, coding, and various IT and SysAdmin jobs for the last 12 years or so. Surprisingly I still suck at it all, and don’t know very much. But, this blog is how I intend to change that. If I force myself to write about and use the knowledge I gather I hope that it will “stick” a little better, and I will get better at putting it into practice.

I hope that something in here will help you, or someone you know on their journey to learn more as well!
entry.summary: You’re probably wondering where the hell you’ve ended up.
